mapper.select: SELECT a.*, m.isMerchant, m.nickName as merchant_name, m.header as merchant_face_img, m.bibiCode as merchant_bibi_code, b.title as language_title, b.logo_url as language_logo_url, b.description as language_description from shop_goods a left join shop_goods_lang b on(a.id=b.goods_id and b.language_id = ${languageId}) left join t_user_info m on(a.user_id=m.userId) where a.id=#{id} and a.is_del=0

SELECT a.*, b.title as language_title, b.logo_url as language_logo_url, b.description as language_description from shop_goods a left join shop_goods_lang b on(a.id=b.goods_id and b.language_id = ${languageId}) where a.user_id=#{userId} and a.is_del=0 order by a.order_num desc

SELECT a.*, b.title as language_title, b.logo_url as language_logo_url, b.description as language_description from shop_goods a left join shop_goods_lang b on(a.id=b.goods_id and b.language_id = ${languageId}) where a.user_id=#{userId} and a.status = 1 and a.is_del=0 order by a.order_num desc

SELECT b.*, c.title as language_title, c.logo_url as language_logo_url, c.description as language_description from shop_user_favorite_goods a left join shop_goods b on(a.goods_id=b.id) left join shop_goods_lang c on(b.id=c.goods_id and c.language_id = ${query.languageId}) where a.user_id=#{query.userId} and b.is_del=0 order by a.create_time desc
